messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

invoices pending approval sent wednesday november pending approval importance high hi could you please reassign below for approval seem be with but cannot them her thank you kind regards accountant ext en sent november re pending approval si search si sent pending approval sa sa reassign la kind regards accountant ext en

I anticipate this will fall under "Purchase" given the mention of invoices.

The "accountant" and "reassign for approval" phrases are key indicators.
